entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
